          The breakpoint for color interpolation.

          The color scheme to use

          java.text.DecimalFormat countFormat
          Formatting of the auto zooming counting value in the file name.

        • distance

          double distance
          The distance to move in the x and y directions.

        • isAutoZoomingMode

          boolean isAutoZoomingMode
          Is auto zooming being used.
          See Also:
          Fractal.runAutoZoom()

        • magnitudeCounts

          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> magnitudeCounts
          For tracking the values seen for magnitude. Added to identify a better way to do color interpolation.

        • maxIterations

          int maxIterations
          The maximum number of iterations to test each value for membership.

        • xIncrement

          double xIncrement
          Scaled unit in x direction

        • xStart

          double xStart
          The upper-left x value (real portion of the Complex number).

        • yIncrement

          double yIncrement
          Scaled unit in y direction

        • yStart

          double yStart
          The upper-left y value (imaginary portion of the Complex number).
